subject: FROM MR. GODSWILL O. AKPABI
body:
FROM MR. GODSWILL O. AKPABIO  
SENATE PRESIDENT FOREIGN DEBT
FUND SETTLEMENT COMMITTEE CBN
LAGOS-NIGERIA.
Attention: Beneficiary: ,
This is to congratulate you for scaling through the hurdles of screening by the board of directors of this payment task force. Your payment file was approved and the instruction was given to us to release your payment and activate your ATM Master card for use.
The first batch of your card which contains US$10.5 Million. has been activated and is the total fund loaded inside the card. Your fund which is in total US$10.5 Million. will come to you.
Your payment would be sent to you via DHL Because we have signed a contract with them which should expire by 2023. Below are a few lists of tracking numbers you can track from (DHL EXPRESS DELIVERY COMPANY) to confirm people like you who have received their payment successfully.
(1) DHL Delivery Company cost fee is US$159 USD
Name: Marianne Oxener========7516821200
Name: Mary Garcia============7516821362
Name: Bianca Antunes ========7516821373
Name: Cathy Agnew ===========1666191660
Name: Sharon Gregg ==========1155804856
Name: Thanapha Johnson=======7516821373
Name: Edmond Fali ===========7516821373
Good news, We wish to let you know that everything concerning your ATM MASTER CARD payment dispatch is ready in this office and we have a meeting with the house (Federal government of Nigeria) we informed them That your fund should cost you only the delivery fee of US$159 because (Your Master Card) Moreover, we have an agreement with them that you should pay only delivering of your Master card which is only $159 by DHL Delivering Company.
However, you have only Two working days to send this $159 for the delivery of your Master Card, if we don't hear from you with the payment information; the Federal Government will cancel your payment.
Please confirm your full information by tomorrow your ATM Master Card will be delivered to you and I need you to send us a scanned copy of your ID. I await the payment information to enable us to proceed for the delivery of your ATM Master Card. And when sending the payment information, also reconfirm to us your full home address where the DHL Multi Express will deliver the Master Card to you to avoid any mistake on the delivery.
1) Your Name:.................
2) Your Address:.................
3) Your Telephone:..................
4) Your Identification:.............
5) Your Age:........................
6) Your Occupation:.................
7) Your A Copy Of Scan Id:..........
I wait the payment information to enable us to proceed for the delivery of your Master Card. And when sending the payment information also reconfirm to us your full home address where to deliver the Master Card to avoid any mistake on the delivery.
Thank you and have a wonderful day.
Best Regards
Mr.Godswill O. Akpabio
Senate President of Nigeria
E-mail: 
infomail9001@proton.me

subject: Re:    FROM MR. GODSWILL O. AKPABI
body:
Hello Mr. Godswill O. Akpabio,

I'm delighted to hear from you and the news about my ATM Master Card payment dispatch being ready. It's quite a surprise, I must say! 

You mentioned that the first batch of my card contains US Million, could you please clarify how much exactly? Also, it would be great if you could provide more details about this payment task force and its operations.

Regarding the delivery fee of US for DHL Delivering Company, is there any other way to cover this cost? Maybe it can be deducted from the total fund?

I'm sorry but I won't be able to send a scanned copy of my ID due to personal reasons. However, I assure you that all the information provided by me will be accurate.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Julian
